name: mystical mitts
sizes_available: toddler, child, teen/small adult, medium adult and large adult.
notes:
the mystical mitts are packed full of crochet stitch texture, luxury and style. the crochet fingerless gloves are a dream to make, simply seam a rectangle and add a thumbhole. a quick and easy pattern perfect for gifts and to keep. the pattern includes sizes for toddler, child, teen/small adult, medium adult and large adult.

this is a crochet pattern for the mystical mitts, a simple and stylish set of fingerless gloves that goes with any outfit. the mitts are crocheted using us sc and hdc stitches.


this is also available as a free to view pattern on my blog. [mystical mitts pattern][1].

pattern features:
sizes included: toddler, child, teen/small adult, medium adult and large adult.
skill level: easy
stitch: half double crochet and single crochet
instant pdf download
adjustable length and styling options 
full video tutorial (to support written pattern if you are a visual learner)
us crochet terms
uk stitch conversion chart

why you'll love this pattern:
versatile design: customize the length, cuffs and thumbhole to suit.
great for gifts: a wonderful gift to crochet and give at any time of the year.
detailed instructions: 10-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear, easy-to-follow guidance.

materials needed:
category 3 (double knit) yarn (i used amigo dk 100% acrylic,
175m / 191yds / 50g) 
approx 1 (1, 1, 1, 2) balls of yarn for the fingerless mitts. approx 77 (96, 134, 172, 210)yds.
crochet hook 4mm (g) or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern.
yarn needle
scissors
stitch markers

pattern includes:
detailed instructions over 10 page ebook
stitch guide
sizing chart/schematic
step by step stitch tutorial
colour inspiration page
full video tutorial
customisation guide

ideal for:
christmas or seasonal gifts
matching family sets
instant download: start crocheting your own fingerless crochet gloves today! purchase includes immediate access to the 10-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms.

gauge: 
19 sts and 16 rows = 4" by 4"

discover a quick and easy fingerless crochet glove pattern that you'll love to create, featuring stunning texture and a flattering design perfect for everyone. 

need help?
we're here for you! contact us anytime for pattern support or questions.
